;; Enrico Scala (enricos83@gmail.com) and Miquel Ramirez (miquel.ramirez@gmail.com)
(define (domain zenotravel)
        ;(:requirements :typing :fluents)
        (:types
                locatable city - object
                aircraft person - locatable
        )
        (:predicates
                (located ?x - locatable ?c - city)
                (in ?p - person ?a - aircraft)
        )
        (:functions
                (fuel ?a - aircraft)
                (distance ?c1 - city ?c2 - city)
                (slow_burn ?a - aircraft)
                (fast_burn ?a - aircraft)
                (capacity ?a - aircraft)
                (total_fuel_used)
                (onboard ?a - aircraft)
                (zoom_limit ?a - aircraft)

                (n_board ?p - person ?a - aircraft ?c - city)
                (n_debark ?p - person ?a - aircraft ?c - city)
                (n_flyslow ?a - aircraft ?c1 ?c2 - city)
                (n_flyfast ?a - aircraft ?c1 ?c2 - city)
                (n_refuel ?a - aircraft)
        )

        (:action board
                :parameters (?p - person ?a - aircraft ?c - city)
                :precondition (and (located ?p ?c)
                        (located ?a ?c))
                :effect (and (not (located ?p ?c))
                        (in ?p ?a)
                        (increase (onboard ?a) 1)
                        (increase (n_board ?p ?a ?c) 1))
        )

        (:action debark
                :parameters (?p - person ?a - aircraft ?c - city)
                :precondition (and (in ?p ?a)
                        (located ?a ?c))
                :effect (and (not (in ?p ?a))
                        (located ?p ?c)
                        (decrease (onboard ?a) 1)
                        (increase (n_debark ?p ?a ?c) 1))
        )

        (:action flyslow
                :parameters (?a - aircraft ?c1 ?c2 - city)
                :precondition (and (located ?a ?c1)
                        (>= (fuel ?a)
                                (* (distance ?c1 ?c2) (slow_burn ?a))))
                :effect (and (not (located ?a ?c1))
                        (located ?a ?c2)
                        (increase
                                (total_fuel_used)
                                (* (distance ?c1 ?c2) (slow_burn ?a)))
                        (decrease
                                (fuel ?a)
                                (* (distance ?c1 ?c2) (slow_burn ?a)))
                        (increase (n_flyslow ?a ?c1 ?c2) 1))
        )

        (:action flyfast
                :parameters (?a - aircraft ?c1 ?c2 - city)
                :precondition (and (located ?a ?c1)
                        (>= (fuel ?a)
                                (* (distance ?c1 ?c2) (fast_burn ?a)))
                        (<= (onboard ?a) (zoom_limit ?a)))
                :effect (and (not (located ?a ?c1))
                        (located ?a ?c2)
                        (increase
                                (total_fuel_used)
                                (* (distance ?c1 ?c2) (fast_burn ?a)))
                        (decrease
                                (fuel ?a)
                                (* (distance ?c1 ?c2) (fast_burn ?a)))
                        (increase (n_flyfast ?a ?c1 ?c2) 1))
        )

        (:action refuel
                :parameters (?a - aircraft)
                :precondition (and (> (capacity ?a) (fuel ?a))

                )
                :effect (and (assign (fuel ?a) (capacity ?a))
                        (increase (n_refuel ?a) 1))
        )

)
</pddl_domain>

        )

                (zoom_limit ?a - aircraft)

                (n_flyslow ?a - aircraft ?c1 ?c2 - city)
                (n_flyfast ?a - aircraft ?c1 ?c2 - city)
                (n_refuel ?a - aircraft)

        (:action board
                :parameters (?p - person ?a - aircraft ?c - city)
                :precondition (and (located ?p ?c)
                        (located ?a ?c))
                :effect (and (not (located ?p ?c))
                        (in ?p ?a)
                        (increase (onboard ?a) 1)
                        (increase (n_board ?p ?a ?c) 1))
        )

        (:action debark

                :precondition (and (in ?p ?a)

                :effect (and (not (in ?p ?a))

                        (decrease (onboard ?a) 1)

                        (decrease

                                (* (distance ?c1 ?c2) (slow_burn ?a)))
                        (increase (n_flyslow ?a ?c1 ?c2) 1))
        )

        (:action flyfast
                :parameters (?a - aircraft ?c1 ?c2 - city)
                :precondition (and (located ?a ?c1)

                :precondition (and (> (capacity ?a) (fuel ?a))

)

Let me analyze this:
1. "No person is ever inside plane3" means that for all persons and at all times, no person should be in plane3
2. "throughout the plan" reinforces that this should hold at all times during execution

In PDDL3.0, I need to use temporal logic operators. The constraint should be:
- For all times (always)
- For all persons 
- The person should not be in plane3

Looking at the domain, I can see there's a predicate `(in ?p - person ?a - aircraft)` that represents when a person is inside an aircraft.

So the constraint should be: always, for all persons, not (in person plane3).

In PDDL3.0, the always operator is used for invariants that must hold throughout the entire plan execution.

The constraint would be:
```
(always (forall (?p - person) (not (in ?p plane3))))
```

This reads as: "Always, for all persons p, it is not the case that p is in plane3"

This captures exactly what the user requested - no person should ever be inside plane3 throughout the entire plan execution.

(define (domain zenotravel)

        )

        )

                (fuel ?a - aircraft)
                (distance ?c1 - city ?c2 - city)
                (slow_burn ?a - aircraft)
                (fast_burn ?a - aircraft)
                (capacity ?a - aircraft)
                (total_fuel_used)
                (onboard ?a - aircraft)
                (zoom_limit ?a - aircraft)

                (n_board ?p - person ?a - aircraft ?c - city)
                (n_debark ?p - person ?a - aircraft ?c - city)
                (n_flyslow ?a - aircraft ?c1 ?c2 - city)
                (n_flyfast ?a - aircraft ?c1 ?c2 - city)
                (n_refuel ?a - aircraft)
        )

        (:action board
                :parameters (?p - person ?a - aircraft ?c - city)
                :precondition (and (located ?p ?c)
                        (located ?a ?c))
                :effect (and (not (located ?p ?c))
                        (in ?p ?a)
                        (increase (onboard ?a) 1)
                        (increase (n_board ?p ?a ?c) 1))
        )

                :precondition (and (in ?p ?a)

                :effect (and (not (in ?p ?a))
                        (located ?p ?c)
                        (decrease (onboard ?a) 1)
